stimulusHtml: Which of the following replacements for  /* missing code */  is the most appropriate implementation of the class?

features.html:
Consider the design of a  Date  class that will contain three  int  attributes (representing day, month, and year), and a constructor. The class will also contain a method  setDate  that can be accessed outside the class. A partial definition of the  Date  class is shown.

 

public class Date 
{ 
   /* missing code */ 
}
